name: 林群哲
objective:
介紹一階常微分方程式，線性常微分方程式，及解非均勻方程式的一般方法，以及Bessel與 Strum Liouville 問題,並介紹 Laplace轉換與數值分析。
This course introduces students of engineering, physics, and mathematics to those areas of mathematics which are most important in connection with practical problems.  The contents are Ordinary Differential Equations, Linear Algebra, Fourier Analysis, and Numerical Methods.
schedule:
1 week Holiday
2 week First-Order ODEs (1)
3 week First-Order ODEs (2)
4 week Second-Order Linear ODEs (1)
5 week Holiday
6 week Second-Order Linear ODEs (2)
7 week Linear Algebra：Matrices, Vectors, Determinants. Linear Systems (1)
8 week Linear Algebra：Matrices, Vectors, Determinants. Linear Systems (2)
9 week Mid Exam
10 week Fourier Analysis (1)
11 week Fourier Analysis (2)
12 week Power Series, Taylor Series (1)
13 week Power Series, Taylor Series (2)
14 week Laurent Series. Residue Integration (1)
15 week Laurent Series. Residue Integration (2)
16 week Numerics in General
17 week Numerics in General
18 week Final Exam
scorePolicy:
